article_text:
Five games into his rookie season with the Knicks, Kristaps Porzingis has looked better and more NBA-ready than anyone could have imagined.

While he’s struggled with his shot, the 7-foot-3 Latvian product ranks second on the club in scoring and rebounding, and he leads the team in blocks and steals.

But for all the promise Porzingis has...

twitter.description: Knicks rookie Kristaps Porzingis looks NBA-ready but he’s struggled to stay on the floor because of foul trouble
twitter.title: Porzingis’s Hot Start Runs Afoul

image.alt: Kristaps Porzingis has looked great when he’s not in foul trouble—which is never.
